channel.title: How do i change my normal spell names? Please Read
channel.description: Well yes this may be nooby i am sorry if it is, i have managed to change my ancient spell book and my lunar spell book teleports names to home, pking ect, but some reason i cant find anywere my normal spell book and edit that? any help.

item.title: How do i change my normal spell names? Please Read
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

[quote=“joeycookson, post:8, topic:327791”]Yeah done that but i searched lumbridge teleport and nothing was found, so i tried lumbridge and nothing was found. So i guess as they are set to default they just have no names.
Just searched for 1300 and it found one which was named correctly what i want it to be named = Shops but some reason it is not showing on the server? any ideas.[/quote]

Create a new line in textHandler…

sendQuest("SPELLNAME", Id);

Use the ids I gave you. They don’t exist in texthandler because they are in your clients cache.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i change my normal spell names? Please Read

You could always do it though the cache, with toms cache editor.

Just searched for 1300 and it found one which was named correctly what i want it to be named = Shops but some reason it is not showing on the server? any ideas.

item.title: How do i change my normal spell names? Please Read
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

Alright, same thing, different Ids, heres the list

Modern

1300 = Level 25 : Varrock Teleport
1301 = Teleports you to Varrock
1325 = Level 31 : Lumbridge Teleport
1326 = Teleports you to Lumbridge
350 = Level 37 : Falador Teleport
1351 = Teleports you to Falador
415 = Level 51 : Ardougne Teleport
1416 = Teleports you to Ardougne
454 = Level 58 : Watchtower Teleport
1455 = Teleports you to the\nWatchtower
457 = Level 61 : Trollheim Teleport
7458 = Teleports you to Trollheim
8472 = Level 64 : Teleport to Ape Atoll
18473 = Teleports you to Ape Atoll

Ancient

3037 = Level 54 : Paddewwa Teleport
13038 = A teleportation spell
3047 = Level 60 : Senntisten Teleport
13048 = A teleportation spell
3055 = Level 66 : Kharyrll Teleport
13056 = A teleportation spell
3063 = Level 72 : Lassar Teleport
13064 = A teleportation spell
3071 = Level 78 : Dareeyak Teleport
13072 = A teleportation spell
3081 = Level 84 : Carrallangar Teleport
13082 = A teleportation spell
3089 = Level 90 : Annakarl Teleport
13090 = A teleportation spell
3097 = Level 96 : Ghorrock Teleport
13098 = A teleportation spell

Read full topic

item.title: How do i change my normal spell names? Please Read
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

Heres the interface text ids, add them up to texthandler with the new name

Like to change Wind Strike simply add the line

sendQuest("NewSpell", 1454);

1847 = Select a Combat Spell
1854 = Level 1 : Wind Strike
1855 = A basic Air missile
1858 = %1/1
1859 = %1/1
1862 = Level 5 : Water Strike
1863 = A basic Water missile
1867 = %1/1
1868 = %1/1
1869 = %1/1
1872 = Level 9 : Earth Strike
1873 = A basic Earth missile
1877 = %1/2
1878 = %1/1
1879 = %1/1
1882 = Level 13 : Fire Strike
1990 = A basic Fire missile
1887 = %1/3
1888 = %1/2
6844 = %1/1
1891 = Level 17 : Wind Bolt
1892 = A low level Air missile
1896 = %1/2
6846 = %1/1
1899 = Level 23 : Water Bolt
1900 = A low level Water missile
1905 = %1/2
1906 = %1/2
6848 = %1/1
1909 = Level 29 : Earth Bolt
1910 = A low level Earth missile
1915 = %1/3
1916 = %1/2
6850 = %1/1
1919 = Level 35 : Fire Bolt
1920 = A low level Fire missile
1925 = %1/4
1926 = %1/3
6852 = %1/1
1929 = Level 41 : Wind Blast
1930 = A medium level Air missile
1934 = %1/3
6854 = %1/1
1937 = Level 47 : Water Blast
1938 = A medium level Water missile
1943 = %1/3
1944 = %1/3
6856 = %1/1
1947 = Level 53 : Earth Blast
1948 = A medium level Earth missile
1953 = %1/4
1954 = %1/3
6858 = %1/1
1957 = Level 59 : Fire Blast
1958 = A medium level Fire missile
1963 = %1/5
1964 = %1/4
6860 = %1/1

1968 = A high level Air missile
1972 = %1/5
6862 = %1/1

1976 = A high level Water missile
1981 = %1/7

item.dc:creator: @Spirit_Coder Spirit Coder
item.description:
@Spirit_Coder wrote:

This should be in TextHandler.java search for this:

        // --Modern--

Then all the name’s for the normal spell book should be there so you should be able to change the names.
